pages.title: Strange Mushrooms
pages.text: These fungi have unusual properties and not all of them are safe to eat.

pages.title: Golden Mushroom
pages.text: It glitters and gleams. This mushroom has absorbed the very essence of gold ore. No wonder it most often grows near that noble metal, drawing in all the nutrients it needs.
It is quite filling and keeps hunger away for a long time. It can also grant a random positive effect, although eating too many may cause nausea.

pages.title: Dark Mushroom
pages.text: It grows in absolute darkness, soaking it in. Because its habitat is so bleak, the mushroom has accumulated substances that are extremely dangerous to life and is therefore not recommended for consumption.
Still, if you want to take the risk, be aware that besides nausea, blindness, headaches, and death... you may also receive a hefty burst of vitality.

After all, this mushroom survived where nothing else could. Maybe it is worth daring to take a bite?$(br)$(br)Notes: Theoretically, by eating large amounts of both mushrooms you could experience every effect that exists - if you live through it...
